content: अन्वर्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अनुगतः अर्थं] Having the meaning clear or intelligible, having a meaning easily deducible from the etymology of the word; hence, true to the sense, significant; तथैव सोभूदन्वर्थो राजा प्रकृतिरंजनात् <ls>R. 4. 12</ls>; अन्वर्था तैर्वसुंधरा <ls>Ki. 11. 64</ls>; <ls>Śi. 12. 23</ls>; अन्वर्थ एवायमधुना प्रलापो वर्तते <ls>U. 3.</ls>; अन्वर्थतोपि ननु राक्षस राक्षसोसि <ls>Mu. 5. 7</ls> in the true sense of the word, properly so called.
